pullRequest.body:
Instead of `WellFounded (Â· > Â·)`, we write `WellFoundedGT Î±`. We also add some docstrings, and one-sided versions of the theorem which take in `WellFoundedGT Î±` as a typeclass argument.

---

- ...

maintainer delegate

```suggestion
/-- The **monotone chain condition**: a preorder is co-well-founded iff every increasing sequence
```

```suggestion
/-- A stronger version of the **monotone chain condition** for partial orders.
```

Arguably this should be
```suggestion
theorem wellFoundedGT_iff_monotone_chain_condition [PartialOrder Î±] :
```
Here also I think the `iff` is in the wrong place in the name

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(Order/OrderIsoNat): use `WellFoundedGT` in monotone chain condition
